channel.title: How do you change wut the game options say?
channel.description: umm i have a pk server and i wanted to change the game options to show your pk points but i dont know where to go to find it ive been searching for it i can't find it please post ehre if you know.

item.title: How do you change wut the game options say?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

legend rene:

Lol yea hes making crap of the client.java just make a sendquest between the others and change interface id and the txt

i just done that in 2 seconds… just edited the quest names… why waste time on someone who dosnt know what they are doing. and if you think your sooo great then come to my thread and try help me?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change wut the game options say?

item.title: How do you change wut the game options say?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

[quote=“i_own_pking, post:6, topic:123570”][quote author=Goneby123 link=topic=173348.msg1599321#msg1599321 date=1184547485]
wow…[quote author=undertaxxx link=topic=173348.msg1599210#msg1599210 date=1184545276]
same here, cant find it, not even in client.java nevertheless that when i point my cursor on varrock teleport, it says: home teleport.

i can change the letters, but cant find something like falador teleport, or rune or walk or game options or such.
u gotta find out the case # of vrrck tele like wen u click Varrock Tele on the runserver.bat u will see the case # and serach case # in client.java and change the coords and wallaH!

[/quote]
[/quote]

my thoughts to. i bet he cant add my simple code either tbh[/quote]

Says the one with

if(q1stage == -1)
{
sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 7334);
}
if(q1stage >= 1)
{
sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 7334);
}
if(q1stage == 0)
{
sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 7334);
}
if(q2stage == -1)
{
sendQuest("@gre@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 7333);
}
if(q2stage >= 1)
{
sendQuest("@gre@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 7333);
}
if(q2stage == 0)
{
sendQuest("@gre@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 7333);
}
if(q3stage == -1)
{
sendQuest("@whi@Total Kills - "+killcount, 7332);
}
if(q3stage >= 1)
{
sendQuest("@whi@Total Kills - "+killcount, 7332);
}
if(q3stage == 0)
{
sendQuest("@whi@Total Kills - "+killcount, 7332);

instead of

sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 7334);
sendQuest("@gre@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 7333);
sendQuest("@whi@Total Kills - "+killcount, 7332);
sendQuest("Coded by i own pking", 7336);

Retard

Read full topic

u gotta find out the case # of vrrck tele like wen u click Varrock Tele on the runserver.bat u will see the case # and serach case # in client.java and change the coords and wallaH!

item.title: How do you change wut the game options say?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

go in client.java and search for loadquestinterface()

replace the whole void with mine

[code]public void loadquestinterface()
{
sendQuest("@whi@Your Statistics!", 640);//coded by i own pking
sendQuest("@cya@ Pk Stats",663);
sendQuest(“24,30 - all quests”, 682); // 2848,3109
sendQuest("@whi@QP: “+totalqp, 3985);
/Free Quests/
sendQuest(”@red@Death Count - “+deathcount, 7334);
sendQuest(”@gre@Pk Points - “+pkpoints, 7333);
sendQuest(”@whi@Total Kills - “+killcount, 7332);
sendQuest(“Coded by i own pking - edited by Stanyer”, 7336);
}
sendQuest(”", 7383);
sendQuest("", 7339);
sendQuest("", 7338);
sendQuest("", 7340);
sendQuest("", 7346);
sendQuest("", 7341);
sendQuest("", 7342);
sendQuest("", 7337);
sendQuest("", 7343);
sendQuest("", 7335);
sendQuest("", 7344);
sendQuest("", 7345);
sendQuest("", 7347);
sendQuest("", 7348);

/Members Quests/
sendQuest("", 12772);
// unknown id
